bibl.title: Hellenizing Egypt.
bibl.note: Diss. Stanford Univ. Summary in DA 56 (1995-1996) p. 4758-A. - Focuses on the moment Egypt comes into currency in Greek literature and the rudiments of its historical contours begin to take shape. Examines in part. the testimony of Herodotus.
bibl.seg: Diss. Stanford Univ. Summary in DA 56 (1995-1996) p. 4758-A. - Focuses on the moment Egypt comes into currency in Greek literature and the rudiments of its historical contours begin to take shape. Examines in part. the testimony of Herodotus.
